name: Bug's Fault
description:
It's a simple game.

You are a little cute orange ball, which collects coins to get to the next level. There are 100 Levels by the way. During your journey you will encounter more and more obstacles and different coins that you can only collect in a certain way.  There are a few bugs in this game, so don't be mad if you meet a bug, you could say 'That was the bug's Fault!', yeah so the game got it's name. Have fun (btw. it's my first ever made game)
